data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The geological record appears to show that ice ages start when the continents are in positions which block or reduce the flow of warm water from the equator to the poles and thus allow ice sheets to form. The ____ sheets ____ Earth's ____ and ____ reduce ____ absorption ____ solar ____. With ____ radiation ____ the ____ cools; the ____ allows ____ ice ____ to ____, ____ further ____ reflectivity ____ a ____ feedback ____. The ice age continues until the reduction in weathering causes an increase in the greenhouse effect.
data.partBlankContent: The geological record appears to show that ice ages start when the continents are in positions which block or reduce the flow of warm water from the equator to the poles and thus allow ice sheets to form. The ice age continues until the reduction in weathering causes an increase in the greenhouse effect.
data.answer: 地质记录似乎表明，当大陆的位置阻碍或减少了从赤道到两极的温暖水流，从而使冰盖形成时，冰河时代就开始了。冰原增加了地球的反射率，从而减少了对太阳辐射的吸收。随着吸收的辐射减少，大气变冷;降温使得冰盖扩大，这进一步增加了正反馈回路中的反射率。冰河时代一直持续，直到风化作用的减少导致温室效应的增加。
